title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and grate cheese together.
Mix spaghetti with bacon and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg and cheese mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.
Add grilled chicken to sauce and simmer.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy mix of colorful vegetables saut√©ed in a light soy sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or large pan.
Add chopped vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and season to taste.
Cook until vegetables are tender but crisp.
